vendor_name: The Westin Langkawi Resort and Spa
title: Private Beachfront Bliss on the Beautiful Island of Langkawi
description: Discover for yourself why they call Langkawi “the jewel of Malaysia” with a stay at The Westin Langkawi Resort & Spa. Located on a pristine private beachfront, the resort offers unspoiled views of the Andaman Sea and the surrounding lush green jungle - the ideal backdrop for a relaxing holiday in paradise. Enjoy a getaway in nirvana with a superb daily buffet breakfast, one decadent buffet dinner, one nightly pre-dinner cocktail or mocktail each, a 60-minute spa treatment per person and private return airport transfers to leave you feeling like a VIP from beginning to end.
location_description: The Westin Langkawi Resort & Spa - July 2019
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Dato Syed Omar, Kedah, 07000, MY-09, Malaysia

title: Beachfront Glamour at Malaysia’s Top-Rated Hotel with Daily, Free-Flowing Sparkling Wine Breakfast
description: Experience the white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure waters of Langkawi-a striking archipelago of 99 islands-with five or seven nights of beachfront luxury at The Danna Langkawi - rated the #1 hotel in Malaysia by TripAdvisor for the fourth consecutive year. Escape the real world and enjoy a tropical island paradise including daily buffet breakfast with free-flowing bubbly, private return airport transfers, three-course lunch and dinner for two, 60-minute massage and more.
offer_address: Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Luxe Island Escape with 24/7 Butler Service
description: Experience five-star beachfront opulence at its finest, staying at the stunning St. Regis Langkawi in Malaysia with Signature St. Regis Butler Service to cater to your every whim. A multi-award-winning property, guests are guaranteed nothing short of excellence in a beautifully serene, beachfront location. Enjoy a sumptuous daily buffet breakfast, private return airport transfers in a luxury vehicle, a decadent three-course dining experience, one nightly pre-dinner cocktail per person, a 60-minute Urut Melayu massage each and more.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Malaysia's Top Resort with Daily Free-Flowing Sparkling Breakfast
description:
Experience the white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure waters of Langkawi - a striking archipelago of 99 islands - with a luxury beachfront stay at The Danna Langkawi, voted the number one hotel in Malaysia in the TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2019.

Escape the real world and enjoy a tropical island paradise including daily buffet breakfast with free-flowing sparkling wine, a relaxing 60-minute massage each, a three-course dinner with a glass of wine each, private return airport transfers and a welcome drink each on arrival.
offer_address: Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Award-Winning Beachfront Langkawi Glamour with Daily Sparkling Wine Breakfast & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Experience the white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure waters of Langkawi with a luxurious stay at The Danna Langkawi, ranked in the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor worldwide. Set in a prime beachfront position, this colonial-style hotel puts the best of the island's west coast at your fingertips, with gourmet dining, local boutiques and major attractions all within easy each.

Feel the sand between your toes day after day, spend hours lazing in a cabana by the three-tiered infinity pool - the largest on the island - or leave your body in the hands of expert therapists at The Danna Spa, offering traditional treatments. Explore local hotspots nearby or try out the state-of-the-art fitness centre, before returning to one of the five restaurants and bars onsite for Malaysian and international flavours bound to make your mouth water. Little ones can enjoy their time at the dedicated Kids' Club, while the grown-ups can relax in the renowned Wine Cellar or Churchill Room cigar lounge.
offer_address: Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Beachfront Glamour Meets Ancient Rainforest in Langkawi
description: Discover the pinnacle of five-star luxury at the multi-award-winning Datai Langkawi. Famed for its white-sand beaches, secret offshore islands, colourful reefs and jungles filled with monkeys, Langkawi is a peaceful paradise abundant in opportunities for both exploration and relaxation. Spend five nights in a glamorous Canopy Deluxe room amidst the rainforest and enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, one dinner at the resort's Gulai House restaurant, one lunch at The Dining Room restaurant, private return airport transfers, one 60-minute massage each, a welcome cocktail each, complimentary fitness classes, watersports and nature activities, a discounted rate at the resort’s award-winning Championship Golf Course and more.
offer_address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Award-Winning Langkawi Beachfront Escape with Indulgent Dining & Massages
description:
Discover the pinnacle of five-star luxury at the multi-award-winning The Datai Langkawi. Situated in the heart of a 10-million-year-old rainforest on the mystical island of Langkawi - famed for its white-sand beaches, secret offshore islands, colourful reefs and lush green jungles abundant with wildlife - this resort is a captivating haven that effortlessly blends into its natural surroundings.

Indulge in gourmet drinks and dining at the resort’s five bars and restaurants, located in the treetops and by the beach, unwind beside the beachfront or adults-only swimming pool, tee-off at the award-winning championship golf course designed by legendary golfer Ernie Els, or simply stroll along the one-kilometre stretch of private white-sand beach bordering the turquoise Andaman Sea.
offer_address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Luxe Island Escape with 24/7 Butler Service
description: Experience five-star beachfront opulence at its finest, staying at the stunning St. Regis Langkawi in Malaysia with five nights in a Premier Rainforest room with Signature St. Regis Butler Service to cater to your every whim. Enjoy a sumptuous daily buffet breakfast, private return airport transfers in a luxury vehicle, a romantic three-course dining experience, nightly pre-dinner cocktails, a 60-minute Urut Melayu massage each and more.
offer_address: 09 MY, Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000 Langkawi, Malaysia

title: Award-Winning Langkawi Beachfront Escape with Indulgent Dining
description:
Discover the pinnacle of five-star luxury at the multi-award-winning Datai Langkawi. Famed for its white-sand beaches, secret offshore islands, colourful reefs and jungles filled with monkeys, Langkawi is a peaceful paradise abundant in opportunities for both exploration and relaxation.

Enjoy a romantic escape at this exclusive retreat as you enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one dinner at the resort's Gulai House restaurant, one lunch at The Dining Room restaurant, private return airport transfers, one 60-minute massage per adult, a welcome cocktail each, complimentary minibar replenished daily with soft drinks, local beers and snacks, complimentary fitness classes, watersports and nature activities, and a discounted rate at the resort’s award-winning championship golf course.
offer_address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Exquisite Langkawi Five-Star Beachfront Resort with Daily Breakfast & Massage for Two
description:
Experience the epitome of island luxury at The St. Regis Langkawi, a five-star oasis nestled in the heart of the Andaman Sea. Discover the island's rich heritage and natural beauty, from the enchanting centuries-old rainforest to the shimmering waters of the secluded Tanjung Rhu Beach. Indulge in Pan-Asian cuisine at Kayuputi restaurant, perfectly perched above the water with views of the surrounding islands or enjoy a refreshing cocktail at The St. Regis Bar, a regal establishment with a grand chandelier in the centre of the room, or take the expert advice of the talented connoisseurs in the Decanter wine bar.

The hotel's proximity to Kuah Town guarantees an unforgettable Malaysian escape, with the night markets showcasing the vast selection of local street-style foods. Take a trip to the Langkawi Sky Bridge to witness the best views of the island stretching from the lush rainforest to the crystal-clear sea. After a day of exploration, return to the comforts of the resort and retreat to your elegant room or suite to lounge in the plush bedding and unwind in the tranquil atmosphere.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

vendor_name: The Westin Langkawi Resort and Spa
title: Langkawi Private Beach Escape with Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover for yourself why they call Langkawi 'the jewel of Malaysia' with a stay at The Westin Langkawi Resort & Spa. Located on a pristine private beachfront, the resort offers unspoiled views of the Andaman Sea and the surrounding lush green jungle - the ideal backdrop for a relaxing holiday in paradise. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, airport pick-up on arrival, one nightly cocktail each and a complimentary fruit basket on arrival.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Dato Syed Omar, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Stylish Mercure Malaysia Island Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Dining Credit
description: Combining sophisticated style with a laid-back coastal atmosphere, Mercure Langkawi Pantai Cenang offers a curated comfortable stay on the vibrant Malaysian island of Langkawi. Just a stone’s throw from the hotel’s front door, explore one of the island’s most incredible beaches home to a variety of fun water sports from swimming to jet skiing, or wander down the busy street to uncover incredible dining and thriving markets. Fuel up for magnificent days at the beach with succulent meals from Rice Garden, and finish off adventure-filled days with a nightcap at 99 Islands, the hotel’s bright and welcoming lounge and bar space.
offer_address: Lot 2500, Jalan Pantai Cenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Private Pool Villa Paradise at Malaysia’s Top Rated Hotel
description: Experience the white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure ocean of Langkawi with three nights of beachfront luxury staying in a palatial 490sqm private pool villa at The Danna Langkawi, rated the #1 hotel in the whole of Malaysia by TripAdvisor. Includes private return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfast with free-flowing bubbly, massages, exotic dining experiences, mangrove boat tour and more.
offer_address: Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Langkawi Beachfront Chalet Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Escape to beachside luxury at Berjaya Langkawi Resort, the perfect base to explore Malaysia’s stunning western archipelago, where the shining Andaman Sea dominates every view, legendary eagles rule the sky and every corner reveals flawless, porcelain-white sands. Surrounded by rainforest-clad mountains, the resort offers boundless views of Burau Bay, and is the perfect spot to rest and recharge in style. Laze by the resort's magnificent pool, dine across eight mouth-watering restaurants and bars - including fiery Thai, authentic Malaysian and Italian favourites - or indulge at the onsite TAARAS Spa, a haven of serenity offering a dazzling range of wellness treatments.

Here, you’ll be perfectly placed to explore Langkawi’s countless delights: the crystal-clear waters are a snorkeller's paradise, the mountainous terrain promises zipline fun and the resort is only a three-minute drive from Oriental Village’s vibrant shopping spots and Skybridge. The resort offers a superb selection of recreational activities such as sunset cruises, island tours, watersports and more (surcharges may apply).
offer_address: Karong Berkunci 200, Burau Bay, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah. Langkawi 07000 Malaysia

offer_address: Jalan Pantai Dato Syed Omar, Kedah, 07000, MY-09, Malaysia

title: Secluded Malaysian Island Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Evening Cocktail
description: Be immersed in elevated seclusion and private island-style luxury at Saujana Private Villas. Tucked away within Datai Bay’s flourishing rainforest and overlooking the shimmering Andaman Sea, this secluded sanctuary provides an abundance of tranquillity. Just a few steps from the incredible beachfront, happily retire along the sand during the day, returning to float in the private pool in the evening. Indulge daily with a nourishing breakfast, your choice of either a three-course lunch or dinner and finish the day with a delicious cocktail as the sun sets over the picturesque horizon.
offer_address: Jln Teluk Datai, Villa 1, Langkawi, Kedah 07000, Malaysia

title: St Regis Langkawi: Private Butler, meals & massages
description: Experience five-star beachfront opulence at its finest, staying at the stunning The St. Regis Langkawi in Malaysia with five nights in a Premier Rainforest room with Signature St. Regis Butler Service to cater to your every whim. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, private return airport transfers in a luxury vehicle, a three-course dining experience, nightly pre-dinner cocktails, a 60-minute Urut Melayu massage each and more for two
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000, MY-09, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Langkawi Private Island Seaview Stay with All-Inclusive Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Roundtrip Boat Transfers
description:
Succumb to total relaxation on your own secluded, private island with a stay at the five-star Vivanta Langkawi, Rebak Island. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice award 2021, this tropical oasis - the only one on the island - is the perfect hideaway when you’re seeking an escape from the rest of the world. Come here to recharge, wine and dine in the six incredible restaurants and bars, indulge in a pampering treatment at Ulik Mayang Spa, enjoy a dip in the generous swimming pool, or spend a day on the resort's private stretch of beach.

Rebak Island is one of Langkawi’s breathtaking tropical islands, where there’s little else to do except chill out on champagne beachfront with a good book, explore the lush jungle trails on foot and swim in the glistening ocean, filled with vibrant marine life When you feel up to exploring further, Langkawi is an easy seven-minute speedboat ride away.
offer_address: Vivanta Rebak Island Resort, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Langkawi Rainforest Nature Haven with Adults-Only Swimming Pool & Five Exquisite Restaurants
description: The five-star luxury found at The Datai Langkawi, a multi-award-winning nature haven, strives to emulate the beauty and awe of the 10-million-year-old virgin rainforest that envelops the property. Understated interiors of natural timbers and glass take a clever minimalist approach toward appreciating the surrounding landscape. Meanwhile, sumptuous facilities are designed to work in harmony with the environment: the adults-only swimming pool is positioned with a spectacular view of the rainforest, the Pavilion restaurant floats over the lush jungle canopy on 30-metre-tall stilts, and The Spa is a tranquil haven cocooned by verdant palm trees beside a bubbling stream. Let your days blur together in a delightful montage of pampering massages, indulgent Malaysian cuisine, wildlife encounters, watersport adventures and private-beach paradise.
offer_address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Beachfront Langkawi Glamour
description: Experience the white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure waters of Langkawi with a luxurious stay at The DANNA LANGKAWI - A member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Set in a prime beachfront position, this colonial-style hotel puts the best of the island's west coast at your fingertips. Spend hours lazing in a cabana by the three-tiered infinity pool - the largest on the island - or enjoy an indulgent treatment at The Danna Spa.
offer_address: Telaga Harbour Park, Pantai Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Malaysia

title: Secluded Malaysia Private Island Retreat with Beachfront Dining, Bars & Serene Spa
description: Dive deep into luxurious island living with a stay at the tropical paradise of Rebak Island Resort & Marina, Langkawi. This serene retreat calls Rebak Island home, a private island in the heart of Malaysia's Langkawi archipelago, just a short boat ride from the vibrant mainland. Enjoy waking to the sounds of the beach just steps from your plush king bed, and the tranquility of being surrounded by lush rainforest. When you’re not exploring the magnificent island, dine on exquisite local cuisine at Senari Sea View Restaurant, or simply unwind with a cocktail at the Beach Bar, all while soaking up breathtaking views of the strait of Malacca.
offer_address: Pulau Rebak Besar Peti Surat 125, Kuah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Chic Mercure Langkawi Island Escape near Cenang Beach with Tranquil Pool & Luxe Spa
description:
Sophisticated style and laidback elegance converge at this Mercure sanctuary on the Malaysian island of Langkawi, a stone's throw from the powder-soft sands of Cenang Beach. Soak up the coastal charms and indulge in a variety of water sports, stroll through the vibrant beach town, and visit local restaurants and bustling markets.

Spend your days lounging by the hotel's expansive pool, tuck into Malaysian and international delicacies at Rice Garden restaurant and cool off with cocktails at 99 Islands Lounge and Bar. If you need some pampering, head to the spa and treat yourself to restorative treatments before retreating to your stylish room.
offer_address: Lot 2500 Jalan Pantai Cenang, Mukim Kedawang, Pulau Langkawi, Langkawi 07000, Malaysia
